landing_lg.title: home
landing_lg.h_title: Can 2019 Who Will Win? Follow and comment on the news live
landing_lg.h_description: The last edition won by Cameroon was very exciting and full of surprises. Will this edition do better? in any case it has everything for.
landing_lg.f_contact: Divide the details of your product or work into several parts. Write a few lines on each of them and contact us for further collaboration. We will get back to you in a few hours.
landing_lg.j_reason1: The African Football Confederation , also known by the acronym CAF, is the body which brings together, under the aegis of the FIFA, the football federations of the African continent.
landing_lg.j_reason2: African Cup of Nations football Total 2019is the 32nd edition of the African Cup of Nations, which takes place in Égypte from June 21 to July 19, 20191. It is the first organized with 24 participating teams to take place in summer.
landing_lg.j_reason3: The qualification phase is held between mars 2017 et mars 2019. The tournament was originally scheduled for Cameroon, but the African Football Confederation decided to withdraw the organization from him on November 30, 2018, due to delays in construction and insecurity in several regions.
landing_lg.d_format: During the CAF symposium in Rabat in 2017, CAF decided (decree of July 20) to increase the number of teams in the final phase from sixteen to twenty four. This increase in the number of participants leads to an increase in the number of matches to 52 (compared to 32 in 2017), the duration of the competition and the number of stadiums which goes from four to six.
landing_lg.d_qualification: The formula chosen for the group phase is similar to Euro 2016: six groups of four teams, the first two qualified for the knockout stages, as well as the best four thirds.
landing_lg.d_lieux: The competition is to take place in four cities: Alexandria, Cairo, Ismailia and Suez. Three stadiums are selected in Cairo. Stadiums selected to host CAN in Egypt: Cairo International Stadium, June 30 stadium, Al stadium Salam, Suez stadium, Ismailia stadium and Alexandria stadium

donate.title: Make a donation
donate.description0: While some very well-off layers have the means to be treated internally as well as externally and to move at will, most and the vast majority of our populations struggle to have a meal a day, to be entitled to education, to have access to health care, to drinking water, to electricity and even to travel.
donate.description1: We all have a large percentage of our family members who suffer from it in a corner of this country. This non-political and non-denominational project aims at a simple mechanism to achieve that we can assume at lower cost.
donate.slogan: No one has the right to be happy alone.

members.description2: By your weekly participation, you can give a smile to a family, salvation to a lost soul, hope to a desperate soul, etc.
